00048 struct TextStyle {
00049       QString name;
00050       QString family;
00051       int size;
00052       bool bold;
00053       bool italic;
00054       bool underline;
00055       int align;
00056       Anchor anchor;
00057       double xoff, yoff;
00058       OffsetType offsetType;
00059 
00060       TextStyle(QString _name, QString _family, int _size,
00061          bool _bold, bool _italic, bool _underline,
00062          int _align, Anchor _anchor,
00063          double _xoff, double _yoff, OffsetType _ot)
00064          : name(_name), family(_family), size(_size), bold(_bold),
00065            italic(_italic), underline(_underline),
00066            align(_align), anchor(_anchor),
00067            xoff(_xoff), yoff(_yoff), offsetType(_ot)
00068             {}
00069       TextStyle() {}
00070       void write(Xml&);
00071       void read(QDomNode);
00072       };
